svcproc.title: Remove Axle Shaft from Axle Housing

caution.para: To avoid damaging the axle housing oil seal, do not drag the axle shaft splines across the housing seal lip.

step1.para: Pull the universal joint and axle shaft assembly straight from the carrier housing (Figure 27).

figure.caption: Figure 27. Pull Universal Joint and Axle Shaft Assembly Straight From Carrier Housing

step1.para: If required, remove the inner axle shaft oil seal and bushing from the axle housing (Figure 28).

figure.caption: Figure 28. Remove Inner Axle Shaft Oil Seal and Bushing

note.para: Do not disassemble universal joints. Disassembly will void the Meritor warranty. The cross assemblies are non-greaseable. Do not disassemble the cross assembly. If the cross assembly needs service, replace it with a new assembly.
